textBeforeTable: Multiple alignment beautifying tools Identifies important features in the multiple alignment www.compbio.dundee.ac.uk/servers/amas_server.html Amas Compares your multiple alignment with the BLOCKs database blocks.fhcrc.org/blocks-bin/LAMA_search.sh Lama www.bork.embl-heidelberg.de/Alignment/blockgap.html in your multiple alignment Blockgap Identifies blocks blocks.fhcrc.org/blocks/process_blocks.html Blocks Logos weblogo.berkeley.edu , www-lmmb.ncifcrf.gov/~toms/sequencelogo.html, www.cbs.dtu.dk/~gorodkin/appl/plogo.html Logo Description URL Name Extracting information from a multiple sequence alignment A very complete list of viewers bioweb.pasteur.fr/cgi-bin/seqanal/review-edital.pl Review An RNA viewer www.sanger.ac.uk/Users/sgj/ralee/ RALEE Adapted for RNA www.mbio.ncsu.edu/BioEdit/bioedit.html Bioedit Useful for removing redundancy www.cgr.ki.se/cgr/groups/sonnhammer/Belvu.html Belvu A beautiful editor, very easy to install pbil.univ-lyon1.fr/software/seaview.html Seaview A very complete Java package www.bioinf.man.ac.uk/dbbrowser/CINEMA2.1/ CINEMA Nice online alignment viewer msa.cgb.ki.se Kalignview Java package, available online www.jalview.org www.es.embnet.org/Services/MolBio/jalview/ Jalview Description Address Name Packages for Editing Multiple Sequence Alignments Chapter 10: Editing and Publishing Alignments   Back to Menu
